content.rendered:
Maple Ave Morning Announcements 

Tuesday May 20, 2025 

Today is a “C” Day 

  •  We are excited to announce that the last Liveschool Shop order form is open until May 21st. Don’t miss out on your chance to grab some amazing items. It is also your last opportunity to donate points to the Team Contest. Your dedication and hard work have made the LiveSchool Shop a success! 

 

  • On Wednesday, June 4, there will be the trout release event at the state park. For more information, see Mr. Scrivo 

 

  • The Pop Culture Icon Club is meeting after school on Wednesday in the Large Group Room. Please let Ms. Schnorr know if you need a late bus pass. 

 

  • No Place for Hate will NOT meet this week. Our next scheduled meeting is on Wednesday, 5/28. 

 

  • Today’s lunch is egg, ham, and cheese on a pretzel roll with tomato soup, cucumbers and strawberry applesauce. 

 Be Safe, Be Respectful, Be responsible and Be KIND.  

As Always, make it a great day or not… the choice is yours.
